## ResourceJson.Helpers.IDeclarationOptions.normalized property

If `true`<!-- -->, the output will be normalized using hash-based ordering for consistent structure. If omitted or `false`<!-- -->, no normalization will be applied. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
normalized?: boolean;
```
